Project Details

×

Centralized Point Of Sale is developed as a solution for Vodafone india. Involved in development of CRS and Inventory modules of the system mainly workflow management.

WPS Replacement

The WPS replacement project aims to eliminate a critical IBM product used in existing Telecommunication web application. The IBM product is replaced by a server-based Java/J2EE application EAR.

Magento Integration App

An E-commerce giant for configuration where we used to call the Apis to fetch the details of users and products available. The same data was fetched to the mobile app for display and futher actions like adding to cart etc.

Desktop Applications (Slider & History)

Created Desktop application for slider which will play the video on slide and can play any video on the slider menu. Another Desktop application was about the history on which we click on a perticular year to navigate to the history in that year.

Real Estate App

Real Estate App created for a client to fetch the details in a report format and display various type of graph(bar,line,pie charts) on the data available from Microsoft Axapta.

Project Details

×

Facial Recognition based on Open CV by comparing the image saved in the local with the image dynamically loaded to match the exact formation of the cordinates on face using OpenCV library in python.
